title: Unsupervised brain MRI tumour segmentation via two-stage image synthesis

abstract: Deep learning shows promise in automated brain tumour segmentation, but it depends on costly expert annotations. Recent advances in unsupervised learning offer an alternative by using synthetic data for training. However, the discrepancy …
